trans-unit.target: Espone i tipi <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> all'automazione interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Elemento associato a questo peer di automazione.

trans-unit.source: The automation peer that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that holds the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" />.
trans-unit.target: Peer di automazione associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> contenente <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di controllo per l’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome dell’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The type name of the associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" />.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del tipo dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> associato.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione di valori che specifica il pattern di controllo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il pattern di controllo per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ScrollItem" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Selection" /><see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che supporta il pattern di controllo se <paramref name="patternInterface" /> è il valore <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ScrollItem" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Selection" /><see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" /> o <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> into the visible region of the container.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro è un’implementazione esplicita di un membro di interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Può essere utilizzato solo quando si esegue il cast dell'istanza <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryCategoryDataAutomationPeer> a un'interfaccia <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider>.
